Audio.Locality: Corralito, San Jeronimo, Cauca Valley, Antioquia
Audio.Author: Diego Calderon-F.
Audio.Comments: One individual vocalizing naturally after dawn, 0:00 it started singing, then by 2:32 it started to make duet calls (by itself), and by 3:36 it started a long series of song + calls.bird-seen:yesplayback-used:no
Audio.BackgroundSpecies: Phyllomyias griseiceps,Xiphorhynchus susurrans,Turdus grayi,Myiodynastes maculatus,Campylorhynchus griseus,Arremonops conirostris,Lepidocolaptes souleyetii,Basileuterus rufifrons,Myiopagis viridicata
